snippet: As Alabama and Oregon seem destined to play for a national championship, Crimson Tide Coach Nick Saban has questioned whether the Ducks’ no-huddle offense is a risk to player safety.
abstract: College Football Analysis; Alabama coach Nick Saban questions whether Oregon's no-huddle offense is a risk to player safety; Oregon and Alabama are chasing national title.
lead_paragraph: As Alabama and Oregon seem destined to play for a national championship, Crimson Tide Coach Nick Saban has questioned whether the Ducks’ no-huddle offense is a risk to player safety.

headline.seo: Alabama Coach Nick Saban Questions Oregon’s Offense
headline.main: Saban Beholds Oregon’s Offense, and Does Not See Beauty
headline.print_headline: Saban Beholds Oregon’s Offense, and Does Not See Beauty
